order_coffee: Je voudrais un café, s'il vous plaît.
experience: J'ai de l'expérience en tant que ...
cultural_fact_1: France is famous for its cuisine, including cheese, wine, and pastries.
cultural_fact_2: The Eiffel Tower in Paris is one of the most visited monuments in the world.
cultural_fact_3: France has the most time zones of any country in the world.
cultural_fact_4: The French Revolution began in 1789 and changed the course of history.
cultural_fact_5: Bastille Day, celebrated on July 14th, is France's national holiday.
